top.title: ACERHO
top.description: “We are dedicated to training and guiding individuals and organizations in strengthening their knowledge and skills in digital security.”

description.title: Our solution:
description.content: ACERHO provides comprehensive and proactive technical support that not only addresses the immediate needs of its clients in cybersecurity, but also contributes to their long-term growth and success by protecting their digital assets and mitigating risks.

features.title: Features
features.description: Our operational control and monitoring tools allow owners and administrators to stay informed of important events and take immediate action when necessary. It provides comprehensive and proactive cybersecurity defense for your organization, through constant and advanced monitoring of your IT infrastructure, potential threats are quickly detected and responded to, ensuring continuous protection of your digital assets.

items.title: Proactive monitoring
items.text: Continuously monitor the organization's IT infrastructure and systems for potential threats and anomalies.

items.title: Incident detection and response
items.text: Identify, investigate, and respond quickly to cybersecurity incidents, such as intrusions, malware, exploited vulnerabilities, etc.

items.title: Vulnerability management
items.text: Identify and prioritize vulnerabilities in systems and applications, and coordinate the application of patches and solutions.

items.title: Forensic analysis
items.text: Conduct forensic analysis on compromised systems to determine the origin and extent of a security breach.

items.title: Implementation of security policies
items.text: Develop and enforce IT security policies to protect the organization's digital assets and confidential information.

items.title: Education and awareness
items.text: Provide cybersecurity training and awareness for employees and end users, to help prevent incidents due to human errors.

items.title: Collaboration with other IT areas
items.text: Work closely with other IT teams, such as the network team, the application team, etc., to ensure a comprehensive security posture.

items.title: Security experts
items.text: Our team consists of highly trained and certified cybersecurity experts.

items.title: Advanced tools and technologies
items.text: We use cutting-edge tools and technologies in cybersecurity to monitor, detect, and respond to threats efficiently.

items.title: Well-defined processes and procedures
items.text: We have clear and well-defined processes and procedures for incident management.

items.title: Transparency and communication
items.text: We maintain open and transparent communication with our clients at all times.

items.title: Continuous improvement
items.text: We are committed to the continuous improvement of our services and processes.

topAlternative.title: ISO 27001
topAlternative.content: We specialize in guiding your organization towards ISO 27001 certification, the international standard for information security management.

features.title: Specialized Consulting Services in ISO 27001
features.description: With a team of ISO 27001 certified experts, we provide a comprehensive assessment of your IT infrastructure, identify and mitigate security risks, and design and implement a robust and effective information security management system.

items.title: Guidance and technical support
items.text: Provide guidance and technical assistance to all stakeholders of the organization regarding the implementation and maintenance of ISO 27001.

items.title: Security incident management
items.text: Record, investigate, and manage information security incidents, ensuring a prompt and effective response to minimize impact on the organization.

items.title: Risk monitoring and analysis
items.text: Perform periodic assessments of information security risks, identifying and evaluating potential threats and vulnerabilities, and proposing mitigation measures.

items.title: Support in audits and reviews
items.text: Prepare the organization for internal and external audits in accordance with ISO 27001, as well as for reviews of compliance with internal policies and procedures.

items.title: Documentation maintenance
items.text: Manage the ISMS documentation, ensuring that it is up-to-date, accessible, and meets the requirements established by ISO 27001.

items.title: Training and awareness
items.text: Provide training and awareness on information security to employees of the organization to foster a security culture.

topAlternative.title: PCI DSS
topAlternative.content: We specialize in guiding your organization towards successful compliance with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) requirements.

features.title: Comprehensive Assistance in PCI DSS
features.description: We are committed to providing you with the knowledge, guidance, and support needed at every step of the way, from initial assessment to obtaining and maintaining PCI DSS certification.

items.title: Guidance and counseling
items.text: Provide expert guidance on PCI DSS requirements and how to apply them to the organization's IT infrastructure and processes.

items.title: Initial compliance assessment
items.text: Conduct a comprehensive assessment of the organization's IT infrastructure and processes to identify areas that do not comply with PCI DSS requirements.

items.title: Development of policies and procedures
items.text: Assist in the creation and documentation of data security policies and procedures that comply with PCI DSS standards.

items.title: Implementation of security controls
items.text: Assist in the implementation of technical and organizational security controls to protect payment card data and comply with PCI DSS requirements.

items.title: Security incident management
items.text: Manage and respond to payment card data security incidents in accordance with PCI DSS requirements, including notification to relevant parties.

items.title: Training and awareness
items.text: Provide training and awareness on data security to employees and contractors to ensure understanding of PCI DSS requirements and promote a security culture.

topAlternative.title: Pentest
topAlternative.content: We provide expert guidance and pentest services to ensure the security and robustness of your IT infrastructure.

features.title: Comprehensive Support for Continuous Improvement in Cybersecurity
features.description: We offer ongoing advice and support for the implementation of corrective solutions and the improvement of the overall security posture of your organization.

items.title: Initial guidance
items.text: Provide guidance and advice to the organization on the need and appropriate methodology for conducting penetration testing.

items.title: Planning and preparation
items.text: Collaborate with the organization to plan and prepare the environment and systems that will be subject to penetration testing.

items.title: Testing execution
items.text: Conduct ethical penetration tests to identify and exploit vulnerabilities in the organization's IT infrastructure, systems, and applications.

items.title: Results analysis
items.text: Analyze the results of penetration tests to identify the vulnerabilities found, assess their severity, and provide recommendations for mitigation.

items.title: Reporting
items.text: Produce detailed reports documenting the findings of penetration tests, including the vulnerabilities found, their potential impact, and recommendations for correction.

items.title: Guidance and counseling
items.text: Provide guidance and counseling to the organization on how to address and correct the vulnerabilities identified during penetration tests.
